Name: Football History Football Simulator
About the game: The Football History Football Simulator provides football coaches with the capability to design and execute plays virtually within both 2D and 3D environments! Additionally, the simulator’s playing fields are scaled to actual “real world” standards allowing coaches to accurately diagram and execute plays as well as properly position players on the field in a realistic manner. Coaches can also fully customize their experience when preparing for opponents by having the capability to add team/field logos as well as custom uniform colors to the on field players.
